sentence.Network_en: Her favorite Beatitude is " Blessed are the meek for they shall inherit the earth ".
sentence.Network_cn: 她最喜欢的至福是 “ 保佑温顺的人,他们将继承土地 ”.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... beatific adj． 祝福的，有福的 beatitude n． 至福，十分幸福 beaver n． 海狸.
路加福音里对耶稣的八福（beatitude）有和马太截然不同的诠释---在天国里，那些属于弱势的贫穷的，饥饿的，哀哭的，本来是指望 …

list.abs: beatingup 打纬, beatitudes 耶稣八福, beatinterference 差拍干扰

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French beatitude or Latin beatitudo, from beatus 'blessed'

auth_sentence.content: His Beatitude Ignace Moussa I Daoud, 70, Syrian, Prefect of the Congregation for Oriental Churches.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His Beatitude Ignace Moussa I Daoud, 70, Syrian, Prefect of the Congregation for Oriental Churches.

stems_affixes.word_buile: att=apt适应+itude性质,状态等→n.态度,看法[to,toward,about];姿势
beat幸福+itude性质,状态等→n.至福,十分幸福
lass懒+itude性质,状态等→n.无力,没精打采

stems_affixes.value_cn: 纬度,行动或言论的自由[范围],[
stems_affixes.word_buile: lat宽,阔+itude性质,状态等→宽的状态→纬度,行动或言论的自由
plen满+itude性质,状态等→n.完全,大量
sol单独+itude状态→单独的状态→孤独
